data.comment: The match has started, with Bournemouth kicking-off.
Bournemouth take a 0-1 lead thanks to Dominic Solanke.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway. Cardiff with the kick-off.
Goal! Cardiff go level at 1-1 through Harry Wilson in Cardiff.
In the minute 67, Sean Morrison (Cardiff) has received a yellow card from Simon Hooper.
The home team replace Marlon Pack with Joe Ralls.
Shamar Moore is on a sub for Robert Glatzel for Cardiff.
In the minute 79, Josh Murphy is replacing Sheyi Ojo for the home team.
The away team replace Junior Stanislas with Rodrigo Riquelme.
Jason Tindall (Bournemouth) is making a second substitution, with Sam Surridge replacing Dominic Solanke.
That's full-time at Cardiff City Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
Joe Ralls (Cardiff) gets a yellow card.
Jack Simpson is on a sub for Adam Smith for Bournemouth.
